Strife

About Me

Hi! My name is Adam and I'm very enticed by software engineering. I'm not sure if it is achitechting something that other's will use, or the delight of creating a solution for a tough problem, or I just simply find it enjoyable. It's probably all of the above.

Coding has always been a part of my life in some shape or form.I didn't pursue it as a career early on, because I thought I'd end up hating it
